headline: Ameriprise Expands Tech Exposure With Launch Of Seligman Ventures Unit
summary: Seligman Investments, part of Ameriprise Financial (NYSE:AMP), has launched Seligman Ventures. The new unit will focus on early-stage through pre-IPO technology investments. This move extends Ameriprise's reach deeper into the venture capital ecosystem. For you as an investor, Seligman Ventures adds another piece to the Ameriprise Financial story. NYSE:AMP is already known for wealth and asset management, and this new arm connects that core business to earlier stage technology companies. It...
